company_profile.growth_narrative_requirement: Maintain credible growth story while reaching breakeven within 12 months
company_profile.board_mandate: Breakeven in 12 months (define metric explicitly) without breaking growth narrative

decision_objective.primary: Achieve breakeven within 12 months via governed triggers and phased operating plan
secondary: Preserve or improve retention and product momentum
Maintain pipeline health and predictable revenue growth

breakeven_definition_options.definition: Operating cash flow - capex >= 0 over trailing 3-month average

arr_to_revenue_recognition_lag.description: Assume revenue ~ ARR on run-rate basis

opex_current_usd_per_month.notes: All-in operating expenses excluding COGS; placeholder until actuals loaded

net_burn_current_usd_per_month.notes: Placeholder; actuals to replace in first operating cycle

cash_on_hand_usd.notes: Unknown; must be filled to calibrate runway triggers

revenue_levers: NRR improvement via churn reduction + expansion motions
cost_levers: GTM efficiency (CAC payback, quota capacity right-sizing)
R&D focus (reduce non-core spend, improve release ROI)
Cloud/infra and COGS optimization (without GM degradation)

non_negotiables: Do not materially degrade customer experience or retention
Do not cut roadmap items tied to retention/NRR
Maintain credible growth guidance supported by leading indicators
No fake precision: all targets expressed as ranges and verified monthly
guardrails: NRR must not fall below defined floor
Pipeline coverage must not fall below defined floor
Gross margin must not fall below defined floor

deliverables_from_this_run: Trigger specification (what to measure, formulas, windows, actions)
Gating rules (what is allowed/blocked by signal state)
Outcome contract (definitions, cadence, owners, reporting, escalation)
Board memo draft (decision narrative + plan + risks)
